title: Private ip leaking through response

profile.name: Urban Company
profile.about: Urban Company is a platform that allows skilled, professional to connect with users looking for specific at-home services

vulnerability_information:
**Name of Vulnerability:** Information desclosure
**User Details:** +91 ████
**Summary:** Private ip addresses are leaking through response in urban clap.

**Description:**
Hi team.
During my research i found some IP address from the response.After finding the origin of the ip i found that these ip addresses are belongs to a private network.I am not sure about the severity of the issue,If this is not a serious issue then close this report as informative,because i submitted this report only due to my curiosity.

Here is the ip
* █████
* ██████
* ██████

Here is the details obtain from whois command

    NetHandle:      NET-172-16-0-0-1
    Parent:         NET172 (NET-172-0-0-0-0)

    RegDate:        1994-03-15
    Updated:        2013-08-30

## Steps To Reproduce:


  1. Load https://www.urbanclap.com and open the response in Burp suite
  2. Check the response you will get these ip addresses 
  3. Search for ███████ 
  
## Supporting Material/References:

  * Images

Thank you

## Impact

Attacker get deatils about the ip.Also this information can help an attacker to identify other vulnerabilities in the future.

activities.message:
Hi,

Thanks for submitting this potential vulnerability with us, we are in process of looking into this vulnerability. We will update, once we need more information or we will triage this report.

Regards,
UrbanClap Security

Hi @midhun_k_b, 

Just an update: There is no impact of the IPs being leaked. 172.31.*.* is our private VPC which cannot be accessed from outside anyways. We may fix this as a defense in depth strategy but there is no impact as such. If you can explain how an attacker can use this to exploit something, that would be a plus point.

Thanks,
███████

Hi @midhun_k_b,

I believe we have fixed this. Can you please confirm? Please do note that this report might not be eligible for bounty, as there was no impact here, though you will benefit from the reputation points.

Thanks,
█████

Hi @thecoolhacker 
Great!. I cannot find the IP from the response.So you can change the status of the report.Why is this report not eligible for bounty?Could you please give me a swag/stickers for this report??
There is an interesting part.@thecoolhacker I found your name :) :).
Thank you

Hi @midhun_k_b,

Thanks again for reporting this to us. Due to the lack of impact, this report isn't eligible for a monetary reward. There is no way an attacker could have used this to exploit anything. This was more of a small bug on our side rather than a vulnerability. We hope you understand.

We will get back with an update on the swag though. We will ask for more details when required. 

Happy hacking! Looking forward to more reports from you.

Regards,
UrbanClap Security.
HI @urbanclap I am waiting for your update about swag.Thank you !

Hi @midhun_k_b, 

We are sorry to tell you this, but due to some issues, we won't be able to provide any swag for the time being, but in future when we expand the program we will definitely think about it.

Thanks for thinking about UC security. Looking forward for your next report.

Thanks,
UrbanClap Security.
Hi Can we disclose this report as limited

limited disclosure please . Also add a summary. 
In the past I asked for some swags. But that time didn't have swags. Is it possible to send some swag for me?

Thank you
